bullets: Led technical discovery, developed architecture strategy, and supported two teams in the production-quality development of live artist-fan interactive experiences.
Partnered directly with managers and leadership to plan technical work and facilitate cross-team collaboration.

Evangelized technical discovery strategy across Spotify, including delivering company-wide talks, collaborating on product area-level technical strategy, and supporting teams, managers, and leads engaged in discovery throughout the company.

bullets.text: Drove greenfield technical discovery, proposed and built proof-of-concept experiments, and led a team of 6 engineers in the design, implementation, and scaling of new fan monetization features for artists.

links.text: new fan monetization features for artists

bullets: Led a team of 4 engineers in the design and implementation of a cross-channel (email & in-app) notification targeting and delivery platform for Spotify for Artists, which now serves millions of notifications daily.

bullets.text: Led a team of 3 engineers in the design and implementation of the backend systems and data pipelines that powered Spotify Wrapped for Artists 2020.
Collaborated in the design and led the backend and personalization implementation of the Home screen for the Spotify for Artists mobile app.

bullets: Led a team of 4 engineers in the design and implementation of a customer support team admin tool for Spotify for Artists.

bullets.text: Designed and implemented a platform for automatically generating unique shareable social media assets for Spotify for Artists users.

bullets: Managed relationships with team stakeholders, groomed and prioritized the team's backlog, and worked directly with product and design partners to plan the team's future roadmap including advocating for prioritization of technical improvements.
Designed and implemented a Java and Python-based data pipeline to make analytics from third-party contract analysis tools for over 100K contracts available to stakeholders across Google.

Researched and implemented new performance and UX-focused features in Android and Angular frontends and a Google Cloud-based backend for a cross-platform issue-tracking app, resulting in a 250% increase in daily active users.
Managed a team of two contractors to implement new features for and support users of third-party document management software.
Led efforts to simultaneously improve test coverage and reduce test maintenance time by building an automated test data generation framework.
Provided Java mentorship and over 1,000 code reviews to engineers across the company.
Designed and implemented a Java-based multithreaded automation system for an international batch processing platform, reducing daily processing time by over 50%.
Created a user interface for triggering and monitoring automation using a vendor toolkit and C#.
Communicated and persisted data between front and back ends using Sybase ASE databases.
Used Agile Scrum methodology to conduct eight one-week sprints to meet the needs of product owners while giving weekly sprint demonstrations.
Implemented a PHP-driven system for delivering, validating, and installing firmware updates to Linux-based machines.
Built a Sencha Touch Javascript tablet application for managing and selecting update packages.
